sentences.sContent: The hospital should be held accountable for the quality of care it gives.
sentences.sCn: 医院应当对医护质量负责。

sentences.sContent: ...a number of factors are accountable for this old saying...
...Some Chicago teachers seem to think that they shouldn't be held accountable until poverty is solved...
...They include such measures as accountable care organizations to take charge of a patient's needs with an eye on both cost and quality...
...While Wall Street executives used their expensive lawyers to ensure that their ranks were not held accountable for the misdeeds that the crisis in 2008 so graphically revealed...

synos.tran: 有责任的；有解释义务的；可解释的

words.tran: [会计] 帐户；解释；[会计] 帐目，帐单；理由
有义务；有责任；可说明性

trans.tranOther: responsible for the effects of your actions and willing to explain or be criticized for them
